nodes.text: Vrakolian spin-blades, also referred to as Vrakolian spinblades, were a variety of small razor-edged throwing discs that were produced by the Vrakolian. The thick-skinned sentient species typically used these blades as part of certain games of skill, while other species adopted them for use as deadly weapons. A skilled thrower could make the blades curve in flight, allowing them to hit targets under cover.
